mapper.select: SELECT PF_NM, PF_TELNO, PF_CS_PART, PF_CS_PART_DETAIL, PF_PLC_NM, USER_NO FROM PROFESSER WHERE C_CD = (SELECT C_CD FROM DEPT_CD WHERE C_NMK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{department}, '%'))

SELECT P.PF_NM, P.PF_TELNO, P.PF_CS_PART, P.PF_CS_PART_DETAIL, P.PF_PLC_NM, P.PF_NO, D.C_NMK, U.email FROM PROFESSER P JOIN DEPT_CD D ON P.C_CD = D.C_CD JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE P.USER_NO = #{userNo};
